mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.trusts_id AS "trusts.id", b.name AS "trusts.name", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.school AS "school", a.classes_id AS "classesId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_office b ON a.trusts_id = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_student( id, name, sex, trusts_id, birthday, school, classes_id, create_date, update_date, status, remarks, create_by, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{trusts.id}, #{birthday}, #{school}, #{classesId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE my_student SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, trusts_id = #{trusts.id}, birthday = #{birthday}, school = #{school}, classes_id = #{classesId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
